LocalizedStrings:
Ultraviolet Framework Application
Cannot find the compatibility shim for the current platform ({0})
Dependency type '{0}' has not been registered or does not have a matching constructor.
The specified resource was not created by the current Ultraviolet context.
No Ultraviolet context exists.
No Ultraviolet context was created. Ensure that OnCreatingUltravioletContext() is properly implemented.
An instance of UltravioletContext already exists.
The specified factory method is not a valid delegate.
The specified factory method has already been registered.
A factory method with the specified name has already been registered.
No factory method has been registered for type '{0}'.
No factory method has been registered with the name '{0}'.
No named factory methods have been registered for type '{0}'.
Cannot register content importer '{0}' because an importer is already registered for extension '{1}'.
Cannot register content processor '{0}' because an processor accepting '{1}' and producing '{2}' is already registered.
Content importer '{0}' requires a public parameterless constructor.
Content processor '{0}' requires a public parameterless constructor.
Could not find a valid importer for asset '{0}'.
Could not find a valid processor for asset '{0}'.
File not found: {0}
Unable to resolve content file for asset '{0}' due to an ambiguous match.
The specified type '{0}' does not derive from ContentProcessor.
The specified type '{0}' does not derive from ContentImporter.
Could not find a valid importer for asset '{0}' because it has no file extension.
Content importer for asset '{0}' produced null output.
Nesting more than one SpriteBatch.Begin when using a SpriteBatch with SpriteSortMode.Immediate is not allowed.
SpriteBatch demand/relinquish imbalance!
Unsupported vertex format.
Begin cannot be called again until End has been successfully called.
Begin must be called successfully before End can be called.
Begin must be called successfully before a Draw can be called.
State cannot be altered after being bound to the device.
Invalid handle.
Invalid identifier.
Invalid token.
Unrecognized font '{0}'
Unrecognized icon '{0}'
Unrecognized style '{0}'
Invalid layout settings.
Invalid font texture.
A sprite font must have at least one valid face.
The specified property '{0}' does not exist or does not have a public accessor.
Invalid cursor image.
Invalid cursor name.
Only one index buffer can be attached to a geometry buffer.
The specified render buffer cannot be attached to this render target because the render target already has too many attached buffers of the same type.
Work items cannot be queued because the Ultraviolet context is in the process of shutting down.
Tasks cannot be spawned because the Ultraviolet context is in the process of shutting down.
Work items must be processed on the main Ultraviolet thread.
No constructor on type '{0}' is valid for this operation.
An input action named '{0}' already exists.
Failed to pack texture atlas.
Texture atlas images which use paths containing wildcards cannot have a Name attribute.
Texture atlas contains an invalid image path.
Texture atlas already contains a cell named '{0}'
Sprite references invalid texture atlas cell '{0}'
Sprite references both a texture and a texture atlas.
Sprite references a texture atlas, but not a texture atlas cell.
Sprite references a texture atlas cell, but not a texture atlas.
Texture atlas contains no images.
Asset metadata contains an invalid asset filename.
Asset metadata references an asset file which could not be found.
No layout provider has been set.
A layout provider could not be found in the specified assembly.
Layout provider does not define a compatible constructor.
The content manifest group already contains an asset named '{0}'
"
Content manifest '{0}' does not exist.
Content manifest group '{1}' does not exist within content manifest '{0}'
Asset '{2}' does not exist within content manifest group '{1}' of content manifest '{0}'
Content manifest has a missing or invalid Name attribute.
Content manifest group has a missing or invalid Name attribute.
Content manifest group '{0}' has a missing or invalid Type attribute, or the specified type was not found.
Content manifest asset has a missing or invalid Name attribute, or the specified type was not found.
Content manifest asset '{0}' has a missing or invalid path.
Sprite animation reference '{0}' refers to an animation which does not exist.
Invalid curve data.
Asset paths must be relative to the root directory of the content manager.
Asset paths cannot use directory traversal operators to escape the content root directory.
The specified screen is already on the stack.
The specified screen does not exist in the stack.
The specified window is invalid.
The application does not have a primary window.
Objects in named collections must have valid names.
Rectangle does not fit in packing area.
The specified input action collection's actions have already been created.
The stack is empty.
The content loader is already in the process of loading.
No content manager has been specified.
Content importers and processors have already been registered.
Attempted to seek past the beginning of the stream.
The operation is not valid because the content manager is not currently batching deletes.
The operation is not valid because the content manager requires a deletion batch for an operation in progress.
The image '{0}' cannot be rendered until its texture resource has been loaded using the Load() method.
Invalid view provider assembly.
The specified view model cannot be bound to this view because the view requires a view model of type '{0}'.
